law.text: The court shall enter its findings as a judgment of the court, and such judgment shall have the same effect and be enforceable as any other judgment of the court in civil cases subject to the provisions of KRS 45A.270.
law.history: Amended and reenacted as KRS 45A.250, 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 50, effective January 1, 1979. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 181, sec. 3. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 180, sec. 2 (last four sentences of 1st paragraph).
